body:

can you paste the build log here?

thanks!

We can add `LC_ALL=C`  before the git commands, to force the message to be in English.

> We can add `LC_ALL=C` before the git commands, to force the message to be in English.

maybe directly to makefile even? ü§î

> > We can add `LC_ALL=C` before the git commands, to force the message to be in English.
> 
> maybe directly to makefile even?

```
test:
	LC_ALL=C go test $(TEST_OPTIONS) -failfast -race -coverpkg=./... -covermode=atomic -coverprofile=coverage.txt $(SOURCE_FILES) -run $(TEST_PATTERN) -timeout=2m
```
Solves the issue.
(Created a pull request https://github.com/goreleaser/goreleaser/pull/1195 ) 

Althought now I have another failing test:
```
2019/10/12 11:42:16  warn DEPRECATED: `s3` should not be used anymore, check https://goreleaser.com/deprecations#s3 for more info.
--- FAIL: TestUpload (5.86s)
    s3_test.go:228: waiting for minio to be healthy
    s3_test.go:225: minio is healthy
    s3_test.go:195: creating test bucket
    s3_test.go:202: 
        	Error Trace:	s3_test.go:202
        	            				s3_test.go:99
        	Error:      	Received unexpected error:
        	            	RequestError: send request failed
        	            	caused by: Put http://127.0.0.1:34025/test: http: server closed idle connection
        	Test:       	TestUpload
FAIL
```

The logs of the docker container:
```
$ docker logs frosty_shamir 
Error response from daemon: configured logging driver does not support reading
```

Should I open a new bug report?

tests broke on master too, will have a look https://travis-ci.org/goreleaser/goreleaser/builds/596997746
Travis CI - Test and Deploy Your Code with Confidence

the other error seems to be something on docker hub... its fine now.

thanks for the issue and the pr! üôè
This issue has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
